content: SPN 6-22 CN Cordless nibbler High-capacity cordless nibbler for cutting sheet metal and profiles with more speed and minimal distortion (Nuron battery platform) ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Specialty power tools- - - ### FEATURES:Features Ultimate versatility – high cutting capacity, interchangeable heads (available separately) and adjustable speed so you can cut flat, corrugated, trapezoidal and profiled metal sheet using the same nibbler Safer metalwork – cordless nibblers give professional sheet metal contractors a spark-free, low-vibration solution for precise, fast cuts through sheet metal Faster freeform metal cutting – 360° head rotation for near-instant change of cutting direction and better access for cutting and notching in hard-to-reach places Agile handling – toolless head change with slim, ergonomic grip, balanced body and lock-on switch deliver more precision and comfort when cutting sheet metal all day On the Nuron battery platform – cordless metalworking tools without compromise thanks to longer-lasting batteries, energy-saving cutting heads and a range of services to keep you productive, today and tomorrow Applications Freeform cutting in stainless steel up to 16 Ga Freeform cutting in mild and galvanized sheet metal up to 14 Ga Cutting corrugated and trapezoidal sheet metal up to 6-5/16” depth (long-neck SPN RL cutting head recommended and available separately) Cutting C, L, U profiles up to 6-5/16” depth (SPN RN profile nibbler cutting head recommended and available separately) ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material type: Flat sheet, Corrugated sheet, Trapezoidal sheet, C.L.U. profile Rated voltage: 21.6 V Tool body weight: 4.4 lb.
